version_description: Metadata Updates
Design Update

- Create Your Own From Scratch
- Added grid lines for better alignments in editor
- Auto save your designed cards
Performance Improvements
Bug Resolution For iOS 12.

New: Pro catalogs for backgrounds and stickers
Feature: Duplicate stickers and texts functionality
Improved: Sticker & Text Touch / Selection
